article.title: Local Partners - West Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn about the local partners of the West Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

A list of some our West Texas friendly partners. Some of them have links to their websites that you can feel free to explore.

  • Amarillo Chamber of Commerce - Global Trade Committee
  • Amarillo Economic Development Corporation
  • Midland Hispanic Chamber of Commerce
  • Midland Economic Development Council
  • Odessa Economic Development Council
  • Applied Petroleum Technology Academy
  • Permian Basin International Oil Show​
